FileFormat.FormatDescription: OBO Flat File Format version 1.2 files are text files generated by the software OBO-Edit, an open source application for editing and viewing ontologies, which is no longer being updated. The OBO flat file format is an ontology representation language, enabling the user to model concepts that are not supported in other description logic languages.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: format-version: 1.2
